#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

void solveT()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int a[n];
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
        cin>>a[i];

    int turn = 0; //turn=0 for alice and turn=1 for bob
    int temp;

    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
    {
        temp = a[i]/(i+1);
        if(temp>0 && temp%2==1)
        {
            if(turn==0) turn=1;
            else if(turn==1) turn=0;
        }
    }
    if(turn==0) cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
    if(turn==1) cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
        solveT();
    return 0;
}
